definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay

sentences.english: Larger 10)amphibious assault forces attack beaches head on in massed formations.
sentences.chinese: 大型的兩棲作戰部隊以大規模編隊正面進攻海灘。

sentences.english: Compendium of Materia Medica recorded 9 kinds of medical amphibians can be used as medicine.
sentences.chinese: 明代李時珍《本草綱目》一書記載藥用兩棲類9種。

sentences.english: Three Marine amphibian tractors were lost in the explosion.
sentences.chinese: 在這次爆炸當中損失了三輛兩棲工程車。

sentences.english: The North American Amphibian Monitoring Program is the country's largest frog-counting system.
sentences.chinese: 北美兩棲類監測計劃是美國最大的青蛙計數系統。

sentences.english: Conclusion Onychodactylus fischeri is a relatively primitive type in the amphibian .
sentences.chinese: 結論爪鯢在兩棲綱動物中屬於較原始的種類。

sentences.english: The airborne units were to secure the flanks of the amphibious assault.
sentences.chinese: 空降部隊的任務是從側翼掩護兩棲進攻。

sentences.english: It's an amphibious vehicle, which has a winch and a water cannon.
sentences.chinese: 它是一種水路兩棲載具，所以配備有絞盤和水炮。

sentences.english: Yuke landing force assault squadron provide fire support to the amphibious force.
sentences.chinese: 進攻中隊，爲兩棲軍提供火力支援。

sentences.english: The North American Amphibian Monitoring Program is the country’s largest frog-counting system.
sentences.chinese: 北美兩棲動物監測中心是美國最大的青蛙統計機構。

sentences.english: Sometimes you don't want an amphibious vehicle to look too much like a car.
sentences.chinese: 有時候你不想要一輛太像普通車的兩棲車。

sentences.english: Amphibians are especially vulnerable to pesticides dissolved in the water.
sentences.chinese: 兩棲類動物尤其容易受到溶解在水中的殺蟲劑的傷害。

sentences.english: The platform of the TALON not only has an amphibious structure but is also proven to be highly durable.
sentences.chinese: 爪的平臺不僅有兩棲結構但並且被證明是高度耐久的。

sentences.english: Japan has since started to form its own amphibious forces.
sentences.chinese: 從那之後，日本就開始建立自己的兩棲部隊。

sentences.english: This is the website of The Center for North American Herpetology.
sentences.chinese: 這是北美洲兩棲爬行類研究中心的網站。
青蛙和蠑螈都是兩棲動物。

sentences.english: It is a phosphorus-free calcium supplement for reptiles and amphibians.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個磷遊離鈣補充爬行動物和兩棲動物。

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: Autumn Harvest Uprising (1927), insurrection in Hunan and Jiangxi provinces led by Mao Zedong
(China's achievements of) producing an atomic bomb (1964) and hydrogen bomb (1967) and launching a satellite into space (1970)
